summary:
Just a small mod that changes the modifiers of the sneak attacks to a much more realistic level

*IMPORTANT*
Oh my god! Thank you all so much for over 1000 downloads! You're all awesome!
descriptionHtml:
This mod is very small,
it changes the sneak damage multiplier for all weapons.
Personally I think that if you were to randomly get hit by an arrow in the back it would hurt... alot.

Multipliers:
One-Handed Axe = 2
Dagger = 5
Mace = 2
One-Handed Sword = 3
Two-Handed Axe = 1.2
Two-Handed Sword = 1.5
Bow = 3
Crossbow = 1.5
Fist = 2
Staff = 1.3

Requirements,
There are no required mods or DLC.

This mod is compatible with all overhaul mods such as SkyRe

Credits for the Screenshots,
Immersive HUD (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3222/?)
CoT (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?)
Enhanced Lighting and FX (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?)
author: Robnut1011
